properties.Deficiency_Description:
Due to the age of the culvert, it should be scheduled for replacement within the next 5 years; or sooner if spillway replacement is completed., Failure to replace the spillway, would likely lead to a partial failure which would lead to progressive collapse of the
dam, resulting in flooding as noted in the Ecora report titled Re-determination of Consequences Classification
dated October 2018. Although it is a low risk level for human injury or death, the dam does have a high probably of failure.
